METAL-CONFIG(1) Metal METAL-CONFIG(1)

NAME

metal-config - metal configuration tool

SYNOPSIS

metal-config [options]

DESCRIPTION

metal-config allows to retrieve information about the capabilities of the metal compiler.

OPTIONS

-help
Display available options.

-native-archs
Prints all the supported native architectures.

-native-arch-flags
Prints each supported native architecture prefixed with the -arch flag.

-native-impls <arch>
Print all the supported implementations of the specified architecture.

-native-impl-flags <arch>
Print each supported implementation for the specified architecture prefixed with the -mcpu flag.

-native-arch-supported <arch> <platform> <min_version>
Print whether the specified architecture is supported on the given platform version. <platform> is one of the following strings:
  • ios
  • ios-simulator
  • mac-catalyst
  • tvos
  • tvos-simulator
  • watchos
  • watchos-simulator
  • xros
  • xros-simulator
  • macos

The format of <min_version> is a version number such as 16.0 or 16.2.


-native-archs-supported <platform> <min_version>
Prints all the supported native architectures on the given platform version.

<platform> and <min_version> follow the same rules documented for the -native-arch-supported flag.


-native-arch-flags-supported <platform> <min_version>
Prints each supported native architecture on the given platform version prefixed with the -arch flag.

<platform> and <min_version> follow the same rules documented for the -native-arch-supported flag.


-gpu-family <family[,family]*>
Ignore native architectures not belonging to any of the specified families in the output of -native-archs, -native-arch-flags, -native-impls, and -native-impl-flags.

Supported families are apple[1-8], mac2, common[1-3], metal3.


EXAMPLES

To print all the native architectures conforming to either the apple1 or mac2 gpu family:

$ metal-config -gpu-family apple1,mac2 -native-archs


Multiple options case:

$ metal-config -gpu-family apple1 -gpu-family mac2 -native-archs


BUGS

To report bugs, please visit <https://developer.apple.com/bug-reporting/>.

SEE ALSO

metal-arch(1)
